      • getGap

        public double getGap()
        Getter gap value.

        Space is proportional value. If gap is 1, then gap between letter is same size as width of letter

        Returns:
        gap value

      • getWidth

        public double getWidth()
        Getter width value.

        Width is proportional value. If width is 1, Locator automatically computes maximum width. If 0, minimum width.

        Returns:
        width value

      • setWidth

        public void setWidth(double width)
        Setter width value.
        Parameters:
        width - width value

      • getFlattening

        public double getFlattening()
        Getter flattening value.

        Flattening is proportional value. If flattening is 0, Locator automatically computes fundamental position. If 1, flatten position.

        Returns:
        flattening value

      • setFlattening

        public void setFlattening(double flattening)
        Setter flattening value.
        Parameters:
        flattening - flattening value

      • getArise

        public double getArise()
        Getter arise value.

        Arise is proportional value. If arise is 1, Locator automatically computes arise position. If 0, fundamental position.

        Returns:
        arise value

      • setArise

        public void setArise(double arise)
        Setter arise value.
        Parameters:

      • getSlant

        public double getSlant()
        Getter slant value.

        Slant value range is 0~1 which is map to 0~30 degree.

        Returns:
        slant value

      • setSlant

        public void setSlant(double slant)
        Setter slant value.
        Parameters:

      • setFeatures

        public void setFeatures(FontItem fontItem)
        Sets feature values as of the given font item in one swoop.

        This method may be useful for changing more than one features at once because setting values one by one triggers lots of view updates and calculates.

        Parameters:
        fontItem - a font item to be set

      • setDefault

        public void setDefault()
        Sets feature values as the initial setting.
